flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The drying of meat into jerky is an old practice. Real old. Older than you're Grandfather. Older than his grandfather. older than his grandfathers grandfathers cousins wife's brothers sisters daughters great great great grandmother. So, in short, It's Old.
guide.introduction_rendered: The drying of meat into jerky is an old practice. Real old. Older than you're Grandfather. Older than his grandfather. older than his grandfathers grandfathers cousins wife's brothers sisters daughters great great great grandmother. So, in short, It's Old.
guide.summary: This simple guide will lay out the basics of what you have to do to produce the desired end product: Delicious, Sweet and Peppery beef jerky.
guide.title: Z-Man's Pepper Power Beef Jerky
